title: 90/94/EEC: Commission Decision of 20 December 1989 establishing a Community support framework for assistance from the European Social Fund in respect of objectives 3 and 4 in Luxembourg (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 20 December 1989
establishing a Community support framework for assistance from the European Social Fund in respect of objectives 3 and 4 in Luxembourg
(Only the French text is authentic)
(90/94/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Community support framework for assistance from the European Social Fund in respect of objectives 3 and 4 for the whole of the territory of Luxembourg is hereby approved for the period 1 January 1990 to 31 December 1992.
The Commission hereby declares its intention to contribute to the implementation of the Community support framework in accordance with the conditions set out therein and in conformity with the rules and guidelines governing the operation of the European Social Fund.

The main elements of the Community support framework shall be the following:
(a) the priorities chosen:
- for objective 3:
- women returning to work,
- transnational measures,
- disabled,
- for objective 4:
- new technologies,
- direct recruitment subsidies,
- transnational measures,
- disabled;
(b) an outline of the forms of assistance, which will be implemented mainly in the form of operational programmes;
(c) an indicative financial plan setting out the total appropriations, which amount to ECU 15 600 000 for the total period concerned, ECU 7 million of which are chargeable to the European Social Fund and the rest to the national, regional or local public authorities. In rough terms this breaks down as follows:
- ECU 1 800 000 for objective 3,
- ECU 5 200 000 for objective 4.
This Decision is addressed to the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 December 1989.
For the Commission
Vasso PAPANDREOU
Member of the Commission
